item.title: How to config your mac terminal prompt
item.description: I recently bought a new Mac M1. While setting up this new mac, I realize it might be useful to record some tutorials | steps how to do certain useful things, cause you never know when next time you’d need it.

item.title: Say Hello
item.description: In this post, I just want to say hello to the world, cause this is my very first blogpost :)
